directions: In a heavy pot over medium heat cook crumbled sausage and onions and drain well.
Stir in tomatoes, broth, water, and salami, heat to a boil. Reduce heat, cover, and simmer 15 minutes.
Add rotini, and simmer 15 minutes more or until pasta is done.
ingredients: 2 pounds sweet Italian sausage, casings removed
title: Easy Sausage-Pasta Soup
